revised_title: The Extraction and Preparation of Lapis Calaminaris: A Detailed Account
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the process of digging and preparing lapis calaminaris, or zinc ore, in the late 17th century. The author, Giles Pooley, describes the methods used to locate and extract the ore, as well as the various colors and forms it can take. He also explains the process of washing, cleaning, and processing the ore to separate it from other minerals and prepare it for use.
